about_the_game:
In order to let more players experience the joy of Breaking Box, we have released the Demo.
Through the Demo version, you will be able to experience some of the content within the game.
However, certain features such as skins, loot boxes, leaderboards, and endless mode will not be available in this version.
You will have the opportunity to play through the first area of the World Challenge, which consists of 10 levels, providing you with an enjoyable gaming experience.
Additionally, you will be able to create up to 20 maps in multiplayer rooms and enjoy playing with other players (joining other players' rooms will not have any map restrictions).
The Demo version also includes an editor feature, allowing you to unleash your creativity and create your own maps.
However, uploading custom maps will not be possible in this version.
We wish you a pleasant gaming experience!

name: Breaking Box Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2310 2.9 GHz / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 550 Ti 1GB/ Radeon 6950 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
